message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $1800000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the price of $1800000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1600000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1700000. I believe this price still offers you a great deal while also reflecting the product's value. Let me know if this is more in line with your budget.

I understand your position, Alice. While I appreciate your efforts to find a middle ground, I must stick to my budgetary constraints. I am willing to increase my counteroffer to $1650000. This represents a compromise that I hope will be acceptable to you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1650000. I'm thinking of a price of $1675000. This is the highest I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price for the product's value. Let me know if this is acceptable to you.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I've considered your latest offer carefully. While I understand your valuation of the product, I am unable to meet the price of $1675000. I am proposing a final counteroffer of $1650000. I hope this aligns more closely with your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.
